why is it against the law in England and Wales to have block parties and climb trees? ASBOs are useless! although it is pretty funning when you thimk about it.

It isn't. Next question.

 
 Exactly it isn't illegal so "delacroix2" get ur facts right before saying anything and actually i live in a town where ASBOs have worked wonders on the youths here.

Nooo! My granddaughter climbed many trees when she was in Britain! 
 
 Was she breaking a law?

Nooo! My granddaughter climbed many trees when she was in Britain! 
 
 Was she breaking a law?

 
 Depends whether the trees human rights were being infringed. That of course presupposes that the tree can be classified as a sentient being with intelligence. Or in more practical terms whether it was protected legally!
 :)
 
 And that is quite apart from the Health & safety executive having a fit at the appalling danger a small child was being put through without protective clothing and headgear plus padding around and under the tree, properly fitted and tested slings and hoists, an insurance policy plus police/ambulance and fire service in attendance just in case.
 
 Fine otherwise
